message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both enjoy our gains!
My turn to be reasonable, Alice. This is a much fairer split.
Okay, Bob, let's try this again.  My offer is still generous, but time is ticking away for both of us!
The clock is ticking, Alice.  Let's split the difference from our last offers and call it a day.
This is my final offer, Bob. You're getting a good deal considering the time pressure. Let's be done with this!
Time to get serious, Alice. This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
